Demon-Soul Bolts.name: Demon-Soul Bolts
Demon-Soul Bolts.fullText:
Demonskin Adept Attack 11Demon-Soul Bolts

You unleash a volley of howling, demonic souls torn from the Abyss to batter your foes.

Encounter        Arcane, Implement, Thunder
Standard Action      Ranged 10

Target: One creature

Attack: Charisma vs. Fortitude

Hit: 1d8 + Charisma modifier thunder damage, and you slide the target 1 square.

Effect: Make the attack two more times against the same target or different ones.


Published in Player's Handbook 2, page(s) 149.
Demon-Soul Bolts.flavor: You unleash a volley of howling, demonic souls torn from the Abyss to batter your foes.
Demon-Soul Bolts.onHit: 1d8 + Charisma modifier thunder damage, and you slide the target 1 square.
Demon-Soul Bolts.effect: Make the attack two more times against the same target or different ones.

Demonic Wrath.name: Demonic Wrath
Demonic Wrath.fullText:
Demonskin Adept Utility 12Demonic Wrath

Like a howling demon, you channel your pain into greater power for your spells.

Daily        Arcane
Minor Action      Personal

Requirement: You must be bloodied.

Effect: Until the end of the encounter, while you’re bloodied, your arcane attacks deal 1d6 extra damage on a hit.


Published in Player's Handbook 2, page(s) 149.
Demonic Wrath.flavor: Like a howling demon, you channel your pain into greater power for your spells.
Demonic Wrath.effect: Until the end of the encounter, while you’re bloodied, your arcane attacks deal 1d6 extra damage on a hit.

Swords of the Marilith.name: Swords of the Marilith
Swords of the Marilith.fullText:
Demonskin Adept Attack 20Swords of the Marilith

With a gesture, you fill the air about you with a marilith’s slashing swords.

Daily        Arcane, Implement, Zone
Standard Action      Close burst 3

Target: Each enemy in the burst

Attack: Charisma vs. Reflex

Hit: 3d6 + Charisma modifier damage

Effect: The burst creates a zone of whirling blades that lasts until the end of your next turn. When the zone appears, choose its effect:
• Any enemy takes 3d6 + your Charisma modifier damage if it starts its turn within the zone.
• Any enemy takes 1d6 + your Charisma modifier damage if it starts its turn within the zone. While within the zone, you and your allies gain a +4 power bonus to AC.

Sustain Minor: The zone persists, and you can change its effect.


Published in Player's Handbook 2, page(s) 149.
Swords of the Marilith.flavor: With a gesture, you fill the air about you with a marilith’s slashing swords.
Swords of the Marilith.effect:
The burst creates a zone of whirling blades that lasts until the end of your next turn. When the zone appears, choose its effect:
• Any enemy takes 3d6 + your Charisma modifier damage if it starts its turn within the zone.
• Any enemy takes 1d6 + your Charisma modifier damage if it starts its turn within the zone. While within the zone, you and your allies gain a +4 power bonus to AC.
Swords of the Marilith.sustainMinor: The zone persists, and you can change its effect.
